items.description: developing a dashboard for our customers to view their analysis results and our interal lims. supporting marketing in setting up a crm.
realised software for recording, managing and analysing measurements with focus on displaying complex visualisations and creating a scientific ux.
setup up a small, in-house reporting app.

established the it infrastructure as a working student. supporting the agency growing from 15 employees to 50+ employees. created the on- and offboarding process, helping new employees collaborating with the team.
